name: My Little Pony: The Cursed Gem
name_original: My Little Pony: The Cursed Gem
description:
MLP : The Cursed Gem is a RPG fangame on RPG Maker VX Ace (and later remade with RPG Maker MV) and is based on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic.

It's Rarity's birthday. Spike compeltely forgot it and he decides to find a present for her. He finally founds a strange blue orb that would suit her. The birthday party is great and Rarity is very happy of the present given by her "Spikey-wikey"... But the next morning, Rarity mysteriously disappeared...

NOTE: To toggle fullscreen, press Alt+Enter. To run away from a fight, press escape to see the menu for that.
